scripts.run-api: cd word-api && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.run-request-processor: cd word-count-request-processor && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.run-mapper: cd word-count-mapper && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.run-reducer: cd word-count-reducer && yarn build && yarn start
scripts.run-all: yarn run-api && yarn run-request-processor && yarn run-mapper && yarn run-reducer
